articles.title: Know about Molnupiravir: An antiviral drug, reportedly blocks Covid virus within 24 hours - Zee News
articles.description: Researchers have discovered that the treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection (Covid-19) with a new antiviral drug, MK-4482 EIDD-2801 or Molnupiravir, completely suppresses the virus transmission within 24 hours.
articles.content: New York: Researchers have discovered that the treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection (Covid-19) with a new antiviral drug, MK-4482/EIDD-2801 or Molnupiravir, completely suppresses the virus transmission … [+2173 chars]
